column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ENERGY CONVERSION INTO CRYPTO-CURRENCY AND VALIDATION THROUGH INFINITE SCALABILITY
column13: The invention refers to a method of converting energy values generated by various energy sources into cryptocurrency and to a conversion system. According to the invention, the conversion system consists of an energy calculation and energy encryption unit (1) for a volume of gas registered by a gas meter (2), an energy calculation and encryption unit (3) for the electricity registered by an electricity meter (4), an energy calculation and encryption unit (5) for a volume of oil registered by a meter (6) of the oil volume, a gateway-type data concentrator (7) that acquires the energy data from the energy calculation and encryption units (1, 2 and 3) and transmits them to a server (8), directly or via a base station (9), a computer program (10) running a mobile or fixed application that can be used by a user (11), able to manage both the energy produced by certain energy sources, such as renewable energy sources, and the energy consumed by various consumers, such as a computer (12), a washing machine (13) or an electric car (14).
